title: Borderless Fullscreen touble
body: I have a 4K monitor and when I play league I downscale to 1080p on fullscreen via in-game settings. Is there a way to play at 1080p with borderless fullscreen on a 4k monitor?

replies.body:
Asalami has a good suggestion; if you change your desktop resolution to 1900x1080 for the duration of your gameplay that should assist when playing borderless fullscreen since it will be using your desktops resolution for that screen size.

4k support is still being worked on, but for now this is the most functional solution I can offer. Hopefully with a little more time we can tune the game up for 4k further! :)

Yes, you can set your monitors resolution to 1080p. :P

Borderless fullscreen is actually a window, so if it's smaller than your monitor resolution it will not take up the full screen.
